org.terrier.structures

Class TermPayloadCoordinator<PAYLOAD>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.terrier.structures.TermPayloadCoordinator<PAYLOAD>
  • Type Parameters:
    PAYLOAD - the type of payload
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    NNTermPayloadCoordinator, PositionTermPayloadCoordinator

    public abstract class TermPayloadCoordinator<PAYLOAD>
extends Object
    The abstract base class for classes capable of controlling how a term payload is written to the index.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare

      • saveConfiguration

        public void saveConfiguration(org.terrier.structures.Index currentIndex)
        Add any payload coordinator related parameters to the index. Called once the indexer has finished building the index.
        Parameters:
        currentIndex -

      • readConfiguration

        public void readConfiguration(org.terrier.structures.Index currentIndex)
        Read any payload coordinator related parameters from the index. Called straight after the coordinator is constructed.
        Parameters:
        currentIndex - the index
        See Also:
        create(Index)

      • createPayload

        public abstract PAYLOAD createPayload(org.terrier.indexing.Document doc,
                    String term)
        Build a new payload for the given term and document. The document will currently be pointing at the respective term.
        Parameters:
        doc - the document
        term - the term
        Returns:
        a new payload object for the given term occurrence in the document

      • append

        public abstract void append(org.terrier.compression.BitIn postingSource,
          org.terrier.compression.BitOut bos)
                     throws IOException
        Transfer a single payload from an in-memory source to an on-disk source. The payload will have been previously written to the memory source using writePayloadInMem(MemorySBOS, Object). Typically, in this method you'll read in the payload data from the input and write it to the output directly. Sometimes you might want to modify the encoding/format between memory and disk formats though.
        Parameters:
        postingSource - the input
        bos - the output
        Throws:
        IOException

      • writePayloadInMem

        public abstract void writePayloadInMem(org.terrier.compression.MemorySBOS sink,
                     PAYLOAD payload)
                                throws IOException
        Write a single payload to an in-memory bit-stream. The format that is used to write the payload does not necessarily match the format that will be used to write the index to disk, as it can be changed later by append(BitIn, BitOut).
        Parameters:
        sink - the in-memory stream to write to.
        payload - the payload to write.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • readPayload

        public abstract PAYLOAD readPayload(org.terrier.compression.BitIn bitFileReader)
                             throws IOException
        Read a single payload from a disk-backed input stream. The payload must be constructed from the encoding format used by append(BitIn, BitOut).
        Parameters:
        bitFileReader - the input stream
        Returns:
        a new payload object constructed from the input stream
        Throws:
        IOException

      • readPayload

        public abstract PAYLOAD readPayload(DataInput in)
                             throws IOException
        Read a single payload from a DataInput object. The payload must be constructed from the encoding format used by writePayload(DataOutput, Object).
        Parameters:
        in - the input source object
        Returns:
        a new payload object constructed from the input object
        Throws:
        IOException

      • writePayload

        public abstract void writePayload(DataOutput out,
                PAYLOAD payload)
                           throws IOException
        Write a single payload to the given DataOutput object.
        Parameters:
        out - the output sink object
        payload - the payload to write
        Throws:
        IOException

      • clone

        public abstract PAYLOAD clone(PAYLOAD payload)
        Create a cloned copy of a payload.
        Parameters:
        payload - payload to copy
        Returns:
        a copy

      • create

        public static <PAYLOAD> TermPayloadCoordinator<PAYLOAD> create(org.terrier.structures.Index i)
        Instantiate the specific payload coordinator used by the specified index, and configure it for use.
        Type Parameters:
        PAYLOAD - the payload type
        Parameters:
        i - the index
        Returns:
        a TermPayloadCoordinator compatible with the specified index.

      • makePayloadArray

        public abstract PAYLOAD[] makePayloadArray(int size)
        Construct an empty array of payloads of the given size.
        Parameters:
        size - the size of the array
        Returns:
        an array.
